tool.name: chainPreNet
tool.description: Remove chains that don't have a chance of being netted
tool.command: chainPreNet '$in_chain' #if str( $target_reference_index_source.target_reference_index_source_selector ) == "history": '${target_reference_index_source.in_tar_ref_index}' #else: '$target_reference_index_source.tar_ref_index_file.fields.path' #end if #if str( $query_reference_index_source.query_reference_index_source_selector ) == "history": '${query_reference_index_source.in_que_ref_index}' #else: '$query_reference_index_source.que_ref_index_file.fields.path' #end if '$out' #if str($pad) -pad=$pad #end if $inclHap

param.name: target_reference_index_source_selector
param.label: Choose the source for the target reference genome index

param.name: in_tar_ref_index
param.label: Dataset with chrom sizes for target sequence. Typically a '.fai' file.

param.name: query_reference_index_source_selector
param.label: Choose the source for the query reference genome index

param.name: in_que_ref_index
param.label: Dataset with chrom sizes for query sequence. Typically a '.fai' file.
Extra to pad around blocks to decrease trash
Include query sequences name in the form *_hap*|*_alt*.
param.help: Normally these are excluded from nets as being haplotype pseudochromosomes.

tool.help:
**What it does**
`chainPreNet`_ is a tool to remove `chains`_ that don't have a chance of being `netted`_.
For implementation details see chainPreNet's `source code`_.
.. _chainPreNet: http://hgdownload.cse.ucsc.edu/admin/exe/linux.x86_64/FOOTER.txt .. _chains: https://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/help/chain.html .. _netted: https://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/help/net.html .. _source code: https://github.com/ucscGenomeBrowser/kent/blob/master/src/hg/mouseStuff/chainPreNet/chainPreNet.c
